biography.placeOfBirth: Venkataraghavapuram, Krishna District, Andhra Pradesh, India
biography.bio: Akkineni Nageshwara Rao was born on September 20, 1923 in Venkataraghavapuram, Krishna District, Andhra Pradesh, India as Akkineni Nageswara Rao. He was an actor and producer, known for Manam (2014), Sri Rama Rajyam (2011) and Meghasandesam (1983). He was married to Annapurna Akkineni. He died on January 22, 2014 in Hyderabad, India.
biography.name: Akkineni Nageshwara Rao

biography.bio: Vijayachander is an actor and producer, known for Sri Shirdi Saibaba Mahathyam (1986), Veyil (2006) and Rajadhi Raju (1980).
biography.name: Vijayachander

biography.bio: Ram Mohan is an actor, known for Tene Manasulu (1965), Privetu Mastaru (1967) and Kanne Manasulu (1966).
biography.name: Ram Mohan

biography.bio: Pushpavalli is an actress, known for Choodamani (1941), Vara Vikrayam (1939) and Mohini Bhasmasura (1938).
biography.name: Pushpavalli

biography.bio: Sakshi Ranga Rao was an actor, known for Sagara Sangamam (1983), Shankarabharanam (1979) and Saptapadhi (1981). He died on June 27, 2005 in Chennai, Tamilnadu, India.
biography.name: Sakshi Ranga Rao

biography.bio: Sukanya is an actress, known for Tene Manasulu (1965), Kanne Manasulu (1966) and Sudigundaalu (1967).
biography.name: Sukanya

biography.bio: Sandhya Rani is known for her work on Tapasi (1965), Boudi (1968) and Ratri Sheshey (1957).
biography.name: Sandhya Rani

biography.bio: Chalam K.V. is an actor, known for Alluri Seetharama Raju (1974), Alakh Niranjan (1975) and Sivaranjani (1978).
biography.name: Chalam K.V.

biography.bio: Venkateswarlu is an actor, known for Sudigundaalu (1967) and Kanchana Sita (1977).
biography.name: Venkateswarlu

biography.bio: Bhanu Prakash was born in 1933 in Nalgonda, Andhra Pradesh, India. He was an actor, known for Sudigundaalu (1967), Poola Rangadu (1967) and Buddimantudu (1969). He died on June 9, 2009 in Hyderabad, Andhra Pradesh.
biography.name: Bhanu Prakash

biography.bio: Koteswara Rao P. is an actor, known for Tenali Ramakrishna (1941), Keelugurram (1949) and Sudigundaalu (1967).
biography.name: Koteswara Rao P.

biography.bio: Born 1933 into a poor Parsee theatre family of Ali Bux and dancer Iqbal begum in Bombay, Maharashtra, India. Entered films to support family in difficult times. She was six when hired for Leatherface (1939) in 1939 by Vijay Bhatt and named Baby Meena. Later she became Meena Kumari when cast for Bhatt's Baiju Bawra (1952). She did mythological films with Homi Wadia and then comedies like Miss Mary (1957). She became personified as the archetypal good Hindu wife through many roles, long suffering and always true to the man. She excelled at tragedy and was often shown in a white sari carrying the film with her emotive acting. She was also thought to be the only actress who could sell a film on the strength of her name alone. Her major films are Daera (1953), Baiju Bawra (1952), 0046164, and of course her most well known film, Pakeezah (1972). She was married to Kamal Amrohi with whom she started making "Pakeezah". They separated in 1964. She was also an accompalished Urdu writer and had several poems published by Gulzar after her death. She battled alcoholism and loneliness and finally died, alone, in 1972.
biography.name: Meena Kumari

biography.bio: Anjaneyulu is an actor, known for Sudigundaalu (1967).
biography.name: Anjaneyulu

biography.bio: Prasanna Rani is an actress, known for Sudigundaalu (1967) and Shri Krishna Vijayam (1970).
biography.name: Prasanna Rani
